command_line:
EXP=$MLFLOW_EXP_NAME
METRIC1='metrics.Best_val_f1'
MOD1='CommentCLF1'
METRIC2='metrics.Val_f1_weighted'
MOD2='CommentCLF2'

echo "Case 1. Deploy the best model "$MOD1" by "$METRIC1" of exp "$EXP
curl -H "Accept: application/json" -H "Content-type: application/json" -X POST -d '{"exp":"'$EXP'", "metric":"'$METRIC1'", "model_name":"'$MOD1'"}' $MLFLASK_URL"/deploy"

echo "Case 2. Deploy the best model "$MOD2" by "$METRIC2" of exp "$EXP
curl -H "Accept: application/json" -H "Content-type: application/json" -X POST -d '{"exp":"'$EXP'", "metric":"'$METRIC2'", "model_name":"'$MOD2'"}' $MLFLASK_URL"/deploy"

echo "Case 3. Remove the model having name "$MOD2
curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST -d '{"model_name":"'$MOD2'"}' $MLFLASK_URL"/remove"
release_note: create bash job with new github action - https://github.com/Qiwei08/test_cicd_python/commit/d7abd8a2078bb8004e26154bf06d189caef6a469
